page.title: 11GARDEN CENTRES NEAR SEISDON
page.content: Whether it is the situation, with a busy main road running through the area,or some quality in the soil which makes it particularly suitable for horticulture is uncertain, but the fact remains that there are no less than five garden centres or nurseries within this block. Some are general, selling all types of garden requisites, others specialise in particular plants (e.g. roses or trees) and some include fruit and vegetable produce in their stock. One, previously owned by a now deceased television personality is especially popular and offers its customers extra amenities such as refreshments. Some of the nurseries also offer popular "pick your own" facilities and between them the garden centres attract large numbers of people from the West Midlands, most weekends.
